rows: Use "breadcrumbs" at the top of the setup area to navigate the parent (column, section, banner, block, and template) elements.
Update theHeightfield to specify the thickness of the spacer.

Set background color for the spacer. Background style settings are disabled by default. Select the checkbox(2)to enable them. Clear this checkbox to disable all background settings of the current spacer. Clickto open the color picker and select the background color.
html:
Property

Function

Breadcrumb navigation (1)

Use "breadcrumbs" at the top of the setup area to navigate the parent (column, section, banner, block, and template) elements.

Size, px

Update the Height field to specify the thickness of the spacer.

Background

Set background color for the spacer. Background style settings are disabled by default. Select the checkbox  (2) to enable them. Clear this checkbox to disable all background settings of the current spacer. Click to open the color picker and select the background color.
